mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PW, ADMIN_VISIT_DATE FROM ADMIN_TBL WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{admin_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMIN_TBL SET ADMIN_VISIT_DATE = sysdate WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{admin_id}
mapper.select: SELECT mbsp_id, MBSP_NAME, MBSP_EMAIL, MBSP_ADDR, MBSP_PHONE, MBSP_LASTLOGIN FROM MBSP_TBL
